about_the_game:
RUN YOUR OWN ANIMAL TRAINING CENTER!

Animal Trainer Simulator gives you a unique opportunity to build, design, and run your own Training Center! Create the perfect space to make your pupils feel safe and happy.


DEVELOP YOUR TRAINING CENTER

Develop your training center with new attractions and amenities - jumping ramps, obstacle courses, slalom poles, tunnels and much more. Manage and expand the entire area, create a hall, add chairs, paint walls, build waiting rooms, and create a play area for animals. You have to remember that in your animal training center, there will be different species of animals - and therefore you have to think about the different spaces where they will stay. After all, each pet has its own unique needs.


TAKE CARE OF THEM

Exercise and training are not everything - your task in the game also will be to take care of the animals. Pet, brush, wash them and don't forget to give treats! Thanks to this, each pet will feel at home in your training center.


TRAIN AND IMPROVE THE SKILLS OF THE ANIMALS

One of your main tasks in the game will be to train animals, teach them commands, and tricks. Much will depend on you and your approach to teaching animals, it requires a lot of work and commitment, but animals are able to repay with love and fidelity. Some of the animals will not be so eager to train and learn new habits, you have to find the right way to deal with them.


PARTICIPATE IN DIFFERENT COMPETITION

Open a stud and a paddock, train them, and maybe one of your horses will win in the world championship! Hard training pays off, make your Training Center the best and known all over the world!

movies.name: Animal Trainer Simulator: Prologue Release Trailer

name: Animal Trainer Simulator: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit / Windows 8 64 Bit / Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 780
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit / Windows 8 64 Bit / Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: The Prologue is just part of the gameplay that awaits you in the full version of the game. Manage and develop your animal training center, create a safe and happy place for them! Train different types of animals, and give them a lot of attention and they will surely become calmer with their owners.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
